results.name: a(n) = A008475(n) - A001414(n).
comment: a(n) is not zero if n is in A046790.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: Array[Total[Power @@@ #] - Total[Times @@@ #] &@ FactorInteger@ # &, 100] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 17 2017, after _Olivier Gérard_ at A008475 and _Ray Chandler_ at A001414 *)
program: A001414(n) = ((n=factor(n))[, 1]~*n[, 2]); \\ This function from _M. F. Hasler_, Feb 07 2009
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 11 2003
